facet_1.name: Mana Burn
facet_1.effects: Mind Flare removes unit-targeted enemy's mana based on its max mana.

facet_2.name: Scuttle
facet_2.effects: Vendetta grants unobstructed pathing and unlocks max movement speed upon cast.

effects: While burrowed, grants cast range bonus, health and mana regeneration bonus, incoming damage reduction, and cooldown reduction bonus
While burrowed, Nyx is stationary, unable to attack, and invisible
While burrowed, Impale does not require facing the point-targeted location to cast
While burrowed, Mind Flare does not require facing the point-targeted location to cast
While burrowed, Spiked Carapace immediately stuns all enemy units within the radius
A successful Vendetta attack now applies Break

abilities.name: Nyxth Sense
abilities.description: The Nyx Assassin senses invisible enemy heroes within the radius, including enemy heroes within the Fog of War.
abilities.details: Creates a negative aura centered around Nyx that applies True Sight within the radius. Considers clones, illusions, and creep-heroes as heroes.

ability_1.name: Impale
ability_1.details: Rock spike burst from the earth along a straight path. Immediately damages and stuns enemy units while being hurled into the air.
ability_1.description: Rock spike burst from the earth along a straight path. Immediately damages and stuns enemy units while being hurled into the air.
technical_details: Affects units up to 890 range with the travel distance and spike radius
Applies 350-distance upward movement over the first 0.5 seconds
interaction_notes: When interrupted, Impale prematurely applies the landing effects at the affected enemy unit's current location

ability_2.name: Mind Flare
ability_2.details: Deals a base damage based on the affected enemy unit's max mana, and additional damage equal to a percentage of the damage taken from Nyx previously.
ability_2.description: Deals a base damage based on the affected enemy unit's max mana, and additional damage equal to a percentage of the damage taken from Nyx previously.

facet_effects.mana_burn: Mind Flare removes unit-targeted enemy's mana based on its max mana with factor 0.16/0.19/0.22/0.25

technical_details: Places a jolt_damage_tracker that accumulates all damage instances
Enemy max mana to damage factor: 0.25/0.3/0.35/0.4
interaction_notes: Talent upgrade changes ability to area-targeted with 600 radius
Does not accumulate damage from HP Removal sources

ability_3.name: Spiked Carapace
ability_3.details: While above ground, Spiked Carapace reflects, negates one damage instance per damage source, and stuns the damage source as well.
ability_3.description: While above ground, Spiked Carapace reflects, negates one damage instance per damage source, and stuns the damage source as well.
technical_details: Can only affect the same enemy units once per cast
interaction_notes: Does not break Vendetta's invisibility upon cast
Has precedence over damage barrier sources

ability_4.name: Burrow
ability_4.details: The scarab buries himself beneath the battlefield over a short duration. Grants self cast range bonus, health and mana regeneration bonus, incoming damage reduction, and cooldown reduction bonus. While burrowed, Nyx is stationary, unable to attack, and invisible.
ability_4.description: The scarab buries himself beneath the battlefield over a short duration. Grants self cast range bonus, health and mana regeneration bonus, incoming damage reduction, and cooldown reduction bonus. While burrowed, Nyx is stationary, unable to attack, and invisible.
technical_details: Max health as health regen bonus: 1%
Max mana as mana regen bonus: 1%
interaction_notes: Acquiring Aghanim's Scepter unlocks this ability
Applies disarm, invisibility, mute, phase movement, and root while burrowed

ability_5.name: Vendetta
ability_5.details: Nyx becomes invisible and gains a movement speed bonus. Grants the next attack a faster attack animation with attack range bonus.
ability_5.description: Nyx becomes invisible and gains a movement speed bonus. Grants the next attack a faster attack animation with attack range bonus.

facet_effects.scuttle: Vendetta grants unobstructed pathing and unlocks max movement speed (200%) for 15 seconds

interaction_notes: Does not interrupt channeling abilities upon cast
Attack breaking invisibility has true strike
Shard upgrade applies Break for 4 seconds

changes: Increased Nyxth Sense radius from 350 to 400
Reduced Spiked Carapace cooldown from 23/18/13/8 to 20/16/12/8
Reduced Mind Flare cooldown from 13/11/9/7 to 11/9.5/8/6.5
Increased base attack damage from 12â€’16 to 26â€’30
Impale: Reduced mana cost from 100/110/120/130 to 90/100/110/120
Mind Flare: No longer instant kills non-ancient creeps
Mind Flare: Reduced enemy max mana to damage factor from 0.2/0.25/0.3/0.35 to 0.25/0.3/0.35/0.4
Mind Flare: Reduced accumulated damage factor from 0.25 to 0.2
Mind Flare: ADDED Mana Burn facet
